articles.title: South Africa’s mobile networks have bid over R8 billion in spectrum auction - MyBroadband
articles.description: Icasa has announced that its spectrum auction is not over, and that mobile network operators have bid already over R8 billion to secure precious cellular network capacity.
articles.content:
The Independent Communications Authority of South Africa (Icasa) has announced that South Africas mobile network operators have already bid R8 billion in its radio frequency spectrum auction.
Icasa … [+2472 chars]

articles.title: Be careful of what Russia tells you - Ukrainian ambassador to South Africa - News24
articles.description: Ukraine's ambassador to South Africa, Liubov Abravitova, was speaking at the Cape Town Press Club on Friday, where she delved into South Africa's stance on Russia's invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content:
• Ukraine's ambassador to South Africa says, since Russia's invasion, the situation has worsened.
  • Ambassador Liubov Abravitova has warned of "massive problems" if Russia is not stopped.… [+3783 chars]
